channel.title: Postgres Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Postgres.app 2.3.3c
item.description:
This update removes support for GSSAPI / Kerberos because it caused crashes and connection failures. Please see Issue 539 for details.

  • PostgreSQL 10.11 with PostGIS 2.4.8
  • PostgreSQL 11.6 with PostGIS 2.5.3
  • PostgreSQL 12.1 with PostGIS 3.0.0

To save bandwidth, this update only includes some versions of PostgreSQL. You can download other versions of PostgreSQL on our website: postgresapp.com/downloads.html
